yīzhì unanimous; identical (views or opinions)

shìli power; (ability to) influence

traditional: 嚴格
yángé strict; stringent; tight; rigorous

mìqiè close; familiar; intimate; frequent
mìqiē familiar

traditional: 說話
shuōhuà to speak; to say; to talk; to gossip; to tell stories; talk; word
zhǔrèn director; head

traditional: 熱量
rèliàng heat; how hot

traditional: 規模
guīmó scale; scope; extent

traditional: 熱情
rèqíng cordial; enthusiastic; passion; passionate; passionately

traditional: 統計
tǒngjì statistics
tiānxìa land under heaven; rule; domination

traditional: 便於
biànyú easy to; convenient for

zhànshù tactics

traditional: 數字
shùzì numeral; digit; number; figure; amount; digital (electronics etc)
yóucǐ hereby; from this
